testcase.classname: feature to test google search functionality
testcase.name: Validate google search is working
testcase.system-out: Given browser window is open................................................passed And user is on google search page...........................................passed When user enters a text in search box.......................................passed And hits enter..............................................................passed Then user is navigated to search results....................................passed

testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed
